name: Izanami
temple_description:
Izanami was the mother of all in Japanese mythology, possessing extremely 
powerful divine abilities. Alongside Izanagi, she was one of the creator 
gods of Japan, also known as Yomotsuōkami and Chishikinoōkami. 
In ancient times, she and Izanagi created the Great Eight Islands and the 
ancient gods. However, they later separated due to an incident in Yomi.

active_skills.name: Infinite Tsukuyomi
active_skills.effect:
Deals 280% P.DMG to the enemy with the highest HP percentage and inflicts 
[Break], reducing their P.RES and M.RES by 80% for 3 rounds. 
If the attack crits, it strikes again (up to 2 additional attacks).

active_skills.name: Reincarnation
active_skills.effect:
Deals 220% P.DMG to 3 enemies in the back row and inflicts [Bleed], 
preventing all healing for 3 rounds. 
The attack is guaranteed to crit if the enemy is in [Poison] state.
